String.string: Use the {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} at {@Rgn:46009$$Three Towers Spires}: {@Rgn:46013$$Exetron} to enter the {@Rgn:9012001$$Three Towers Spires}. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]

Search the tunnels with {@linkcreature:412#2001#Greyden}. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]

Talk to {@linkcreature:412#2001#Greyden}. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]
You hear the sounds of battle up ahead.

Start searching. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]

Kill the argons attacking {@linkcreature:412#2005#Hasmina}. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]

Talk to {@linkcreature:412#2005#Hasmina}. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]

Defeat Gilgash, the administrator of the {@Rgn:46001$$Three Towers Spires}. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]

Destroy the argon capsules that supply energy to the {@Rgn:46001$$Three Towers}. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]

Talk to {@linkcreature:412#2006#Hasmina}. [Inside the camp, you can reach the Shadowspark Chamber via the dungeon flight manager. In Exetron, there is a {@linkcreature:246#1502#teleportal} that you can use to get to the Three Towers Spires.]
Report what happened at {@Rgn:9012001$$Three Towers Spires} to {@linkcreature:246#2001#Adeldur} in {@Rgn:46014$$Three Towers Research Base}.
Talk to {@linkcreature:246#2008#Hasmina} at {@Rgn:46014$$Three Towers Research Base}.

Deliver {@RawItem:45338$$Adeldur's report} to Commander {@linkcreature:528#5005#Tamur} at {@Rgn:84001$$Kaiator} Command Center. [Speak to {@linkcreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Talk to Velika Commander Gislan while Tamur is reading the report.
Gislan seems to be troubled. Talk to Gislan.
Deliver Tamur's order to Hasmina near {@Rgn:84001$$Kaiator} Command Center.
